bio:
Sorex Vinius, a young Imperial man, lives in the city of Solitude. He lives and works at The Winking Skeever, a popular inn/tavern which is owned and run by his father Corpulus.
 Sorex has a younger sister named Minette. Sorex can usually be found in The Winking Skeever.
Sorex admits that he disliked Roggvir (who was recently executed for treason), as Roggvir would play pranks on him in his youth. When Sorex was younger, he had romantic feelings for a Breton woman named Vivienne Onis. Vivienne is the niece of an older woman named Angeline, who runs the Angeline's Aromatics alchemy shop right next to the Winking Skeever.
name: Sorex Vinius
